title: Jouran: The Princess of Snow and Blood
synopsis: In 1931, the Tokugawa Shogunate remains in power, marking the 64th year of the Meiji era. Holding a monopoly over the newly discovered "Dragon Vein," the government is leading Japan toward an advanced Edo period. During this time, an elite force of executioners called "Nue" is tasked with defending the Shogunate from a rebel institution known as the "Kuchinawa."
characters: ['Yukimura, Sawa', 'Hanakaze, Elena', 'Tsukishiro, Makoto', 'Kuzuhara, Jin', 'Nakamura, Asahi', 'Takemichi, Rinko']
staff: [['Kudou, Susumu', ['Director']], ['Imaizumi, Yuuichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Nezu, Rika', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['RAISE A SUILEN', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
